name: Integic Corporation
overview: Integic Corporation specializes in enterprise health and business process management services. The company also operates as an e-business integrator of software, people, and processes that connects legacy environments to online business applications. It offers e.POWER software for the integration of applications addressing the critical requirements of online business operations, including enterprise work management, integrated document, and records management and portals. The company also provides workflow applications to the federal government, as well as serves healthcare and life sciences industries. Its clients include the department of defense, the military health system, department of state, department of veterans affairs, and general electric. The company was founded as Universal Systems, Inc. in 1990 and changed its name to Integic Corporation in 2000. Integic Corporation is headquartered in Chantilly, Virginia.

acquisition.source_description: Northrop Grumman Agrees to Acquire Integic Corp.
